verses.verse: וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> called יִצְחָ֛ק <S%H3327><s%> And Isaac אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> about יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob וַיְבָ֣רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> and blessed אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַיְצַוֵּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6680><s%> him and charged וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> him and said ל֔וֹ לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> unto him Thou shalt not take אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> a wife מִבְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> of the daughters כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan

ק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> Arise לֵךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> go פַּדֶּ֣נָֽה אֲרָ֔ם <S%H6307><s%> to Padanaram בֵּ֥יתָה <S%H1004><s%> to the house בְתוּאֵ֖ל <S%H1328><s%> of Bethuel אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> father אִמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H517><s%> thy mother's וְקַח־ <S%H3947><s%> and take לְךָ֤ מִשָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> thee a wife מִבְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> from thence of the daughters לָבָ֖ן <S%H3837><s%> of Laban אֲחִ֥י <S%H251><s%> brother אִמֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H517><s%> thy mother's

וְאֵ֤ל <S%H410><s%> And God שַׁדַּי֙ <S%H7706><s%> Almighty יְבָרֵ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> bless אֹֽתְךָ֔ <S%H853><s%> וְיַפְרְךָ֖ <S%H6509><s%> thee and make thee fruitful וְיַרְבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H7235><s%> and multiply וְהָיִ֖יתָ <S%H1961><s%> you may become לִקְהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> thee that thou mayest be a multitude עַמִּֽים׃ <S%H5971><s%> of people

וְיִֽתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> And give לְךָ֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּרְכַּ֣ת <S%H1293><s%> thee the blessing אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> of Abraham לְךָ֖ וּלְזַרְעֲךָ֣ <S%H2233><s%> to thee and to thy seed אִתָּ֑ךְ <S%H854><s%> that לְרִשְׁתְּךָ֙ <S%H3423><s%> with thee that thou mayest inherit אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land מְגֻרֶ֔יךָ <S%H4033><s%> wherein thou art a stranger אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> gave אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> which God לְאַבְרָהָֽם׃ <S%H85><s%> unto Abraham

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sent away יִצְחָק֙ <S%H3327><s%> And Isaac אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went פַּדֶּ֣נָֽה אֲרָ֑ם <S%H6307><s%> to Padanaram אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to לָבָ֤ן <S%H3837><s%> unto Laban בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son בְּתוּאֵל֙ <S%H1328><s%> of Bethuel הָֽאֲרַמִּ֔י <S%H761><s%> the Syrian אֲחִ֣י <S%H251><s%> the brother רִבְקָ֔ה <S%H7259><s%> of Rebekah אֵ֥ם <S%H517><s%> mother יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob's וְעֵשָֽׂו׃ <S%H6215><s%> and Esau's

וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw עֵשָׂ֗ו <S%H6215><s%> When Esau כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בֵרַ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> had blessed יִצְחָק֮ <S%H3327><s%> that Isaac אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יַעֲקֹב֒ <S%H3290><s%> Jacob וְשִׁלַּ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> and sent him away אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> פַּדֶּ֣נָֽה אֲרָ֔ם <S%H6307><s%> to Padanaram לָקַֽחַת־ <S%H3947><s%> to take ל֥וֹ מִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there אִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> him a wife בְּבָרֲכ֣וֹ <S%H1288><s%> from thence and that as he blessed אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַיְצַ֤ו <S%H6680><s%> him he gave him a charge עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> and לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> Thou shalt not take אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> a wife מִבְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> of the daughters כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> obeyed יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> And that Jacob אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> his father וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and אִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> and his mother וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> gone פַּדֶּ֥נָֽה אֲרָֽם׃ <S%H6307><s%> to Padanaram

וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> seeing עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> And Esau כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for רָע֖וֹת <S%H7451><s%> not בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> that the daughters כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan בְּעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> pleased יִצְחָ֥ק <S%H3327><s%> Isaac אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> his father

וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went עֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> Esau אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִשְׁמָעֵ֑אל <S%H3458><s%> unto Ishmael וַיִּקַּ֡ח <S%H3947><s%> and took אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מָחֲלַ֣ת ׀ <S%H4258><s%> which he had Mahalath בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter יִשְׁמָעֵ֨אל <S%H3458><s%> of Ishmael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son אַבְרָהָ֜ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham's אֲח֧וֹת <S%H269><s%> the sister נְבָי֛וֹת <S%H5032><s%> of Nebajoth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> besides נָשָׁ֖יו <S%H802><s%> unto the wives ל֥וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> to be his wife ס
וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> went out יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob מִבְּאֵ֣ר שָׁ֑בַע <S%H884><s%> from Beersheba וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went חָרָֽנָה׃ <S%H2771><s%> toward Haran

וַיִּפְגַּ֨ע <S%H6293><s%> And he lighted בַּמָּק֜וֹם <S%H4725><s%> upon a certain place וַיָּ֤לֶן <S%H3885><s%> and tarried there all night שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because בָ֣א <S%H935><s%> was set הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> because the sun וַיִּקַּח֙ <S%H3947><s%> and he took מֵאַבְנֵ֣י <S%H68><s%> of the stones הַמָּק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> of that place וַיָּ֖שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and put מְרַֽאֲשֹׁתָ֑יו <S%H4763><s%> [them for] his pillows וַיִּשְׁכַּ֖ב <S%H7901><s%> to sleep בַּמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in that place הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> He

וַֽיַּחֲלֹ֗ם <S%H2492><s%> And he dreamed וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold סֻלָּם֙ <S%H5551><s%> and behold a ladder מֻצָּ֣ב <S%H5324><s%> set up אַ֔רְצָה <S%H776><s%> on the earth וְרֹאשׁ֖וֹ <S%H7218><s%> and the top of it מַגִּ֣יעַ <S%H5060><s%> reached הַשָּׁמָ֑יְמָה <S%H8064><s%> to heaven וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> and behold מַלְאֲכֵ֣י <S%H4397><s%> and behold the angels אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God עֹלִ֥ים <S%H5927><s%> ascending וְיֹרְדִ֖ים <S%H3381><s%> and descending בּֽוֹ׃

וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And behold the LORD נִצָּ֣ב <S%H5324><s%> stood עָלָיו֮ <S%H5921><s%> above וַיֹּאמַר֒ <S%H559><s%> above it and said אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵי֙ <S%H430><s%> God אַבְרָהָ֣ם <S%H85><s%> of Abraham אָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> thy father וֵאלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> and the God יִצְחָ֑ק <S%H3327><s%> of Isaac הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you שֹׁכֵ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> whereon thou liest עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> above לְךָ֥ אֶתְּנֶ֖נָּה <S%H5414><s%> to thee will I give it וּלְזַרְעֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2233><s%> and to thy seed

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become זַרְעֲךָ֙ <S%H2233><s%> And thy seed כַּעֲפַ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> shall be as the dust הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וּפָרַצְתָּ֛ <S%H6555><s%> and thou shalt spread abroad יָ֥מָּה <S%H3220><s%> to the west וָקֵ֖דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> and to the east וְצָפֹ֣נָה <S%H6828><s%> and to the north וָנֶ֑גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> and to the south וְנִבְרֲכ֥וּ <S%H1288><s%> be blessed בְךָ֛ כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> shall all מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <S%H4940><s%> shall all the families הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> of the earth וּבְזַרְעֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2233><s%> and in thee and in thy seed

וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אָנֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> I עִמָּ֗ךְ <S%H5973><s%> you וּשְׁמַרְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H8104><s%> And behold I [am] with thee and will keep בְּכֹ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> thee in all [places] whither תֵּלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go וַהֲשִׁ֣בֹתִ֔יךָ <S%H7725><s%> and will bring thee again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> into this land הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶֽעֱזָבְךָ֔ <S%H5800><s%> for I will not leave עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> thee until אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo עָשִׂ֔יתִי <S%H6213><s%> I have done אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> [that] which I have spoken לָֽךְ׃

וַיִּיקַ֣ץ <S%H3364><s%> awaked יַעֲקֹב֮ <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob מִשְּׁנָתוֹ֒ <S%H8142><s%> out of his sleep וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said אָכֵן֙ <S%H403><s%> Surely יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> is יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בַּמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in this place הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְאָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not יָדָֽעְתִּי׃ <S%H3045><s%> and I knew

וַיִּירָא֙ <S%H3372><s%> And he was afraid וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> and said מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How נּוֹרָ֖א <S%H3372><s%> How dreadful הַמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> [is] this place הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> is this אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> is none זֶ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> This כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> this [is] none other but the house אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God וְזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> and this שַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> and this [is] the gate הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> of heaven

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <S%H7925><s%> rose up early יַעֲקֹ֜ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob בַּבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֶ֙בֶן֙ <S%H68><s%> the stone אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> he שָׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> that he had put מְרַֽאֲשֹׁתָ֔יו <S%H4763><s%> [for] his pillows וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and set it up אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> מַצֵּבָ֑ה <S%H4676><s%> [for] a pillar וַיִּצֹ֥ק <S%H3332><s%> and poured שֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹאשָֽׁהּ׃ <S%H7218><s%> upon the top of it

וַיִּקְרָ֛א <S%H7121><s%> And he called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> the name הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> of that place הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בֵּֽית־ אֵ֑ל <S%H1008><s%> Bethel וְאוּלָ֛ם <S%H199><s%> but ל֥וּז <S%H3870><s%> [was called] Luz שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> the name הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> of that city לָרִאשֹׁנָֽה׃ <S%H7223><s%> at the first

וַיִּדַּ֥ר <S%H5087><s%> vowed יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob נֶ֣דֶר <S%H5088><s%> a vow לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יִהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> If God עִמָּדִ֗י <S%H5978><s%> me וּשְׁמָרַ֙נִי֙ <S%H8104><s%> will be with me and will keep me בַּדֶּ֤רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in this way הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> that אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> I הוֹלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> that I go וְנָֽתַן־ <S%H5414><s%> and will give לִ֥י לֶ֛חֶם <S%H3899><s%> me bread לֶאֱכֹ֖ל <S%H398><s%> to eat וּבֶ֥גֶד <S%H899><s%> and raiment לִלְבֹּֽשׁ׃ <S%H3847><s%> to put on

וְשַׁבְתִּ֥י <S%H7725><s%> So that I come again בְשָׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> in peace אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֑י <S%H1><s%> to my father's וְהָיָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> then יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> then shall the LORD לִ֖י לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> be my God

וְהָאֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> And this stone הַזֹּ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which שַׂ֙מְתִּי֙ <S%H7760><s%> which I have set מַצֵּבָ֔ה <S%H4676><s%> [for] a pillar יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> shall be God's וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> and of all that thou shalt give לִ֔י עַשֵּׂ֖ר <S%H6237><s%> me I will surely אֲעַשְּׂרֶ֥נּוּ <S%H6237><s%> give the tenth לָֽךְ׃
